titles.title: Alzheimer's Treatment and Caregiver Support Act
A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to authorize grants for treatment and support services for Alzheimer's patients and their families.
Alzheimer's Treatment and Caregiver Support Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: Alzheimer's Treatment and Caregiver Support Act - Amends the Public Health Service Act to authorize the Secretary of Health and Human Services (HHS) to make grants to public and nonprofit private health care providers to expand treatment services for patients with Alzheimer's disease and training and support services for families and caregivers of such patients.
